title: Olas
description: Olas (Waves, Spanish version, 63,237 words) draws a parallelism between three major Cuban migration episodes and, to some extent, describes the political wrangling between Fidel Castro and various US administrations. But above all it narrates the misadventures of three members of a Cuban family who decide to emigrate to the US after individually seeing for themselves that they cannot lead a satisfactory life on the island.
author: José Ramón Torres
